name: Sample Case 6: Student Loan Collection
description: A de-identified private student loan collection example.
raw_text:
COLLECTION - EDUCATIONAL

Creditor: STUDENT LOAN RECOVERY INC
Original Lender: PRIVATE EDUCATION LENDERS
Account Classification: Educational Collection

Opened: 01/2021
Delinquent Since: 03/2017
Reported: October 2024

Original Loan: $8,500
Balance Owed: $12,340

Removal Expected: January 2028

Source: Equifax Credit File
notes: This private student loan collection shows issues: (1) Date opened (2021) is nearly 4 years after DOFD (2017), (2) Removal date (2028) appears calculated from the collector's open date rather than DOFD. Based on DOFD of 03/2017, removal should have been around 2024. Note: Federal student loans have different rules and may not follow the 7-year FCRA timeline.
